title: WTB/ WTTF: N300 Mayo Bill Dahlen
author: OriginalTrekkerMike

posts.post_title: WTB/ WTTF: N300 Mayo Bill Dahlen
posts.post_content: I am looking to buy or trade for a low grade N300 Mayo Bill Dahlen.  My trade bait can be viewed at the PhotoBucket link in my signature.  I also have approximately 150 T-205s available for trade as well so if there is a particular T-205 you are looking for, chances are that I might have it.
Have you contacted Mike Brailey?  I think he had an N300 Dahlen for sale here a little while ago; search the forum.

Matt,

Thanks for the heads up - I'll contact him and see if the card is still available.
Trade worked out with Mike Brailey...THANKS!
